pkgmetadata.longdescription: Classes for 'GeoJSON' // Classes for 'GeoJSON' to make working with 'GeoJSON' easier. Includes S3 classes for 'GeoJSON' classes with brief summary output, and a few methods such as extracting and adding bounding boxes, properties, and coordinate reference systems; linting through the 'geojsonlint' package; and serializing to/from 'Geobuf' binary 'GeoJSON' format.
